text: Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki allaha akasatuna pani avatarita karato ani tyasa jaminicya jharyammadhye pohacavito, maga tyacyacadvare aneka prakaraci seti ugavito, maga ti (sete) sukatata ani tumhi tyanna pivalya rangata pahatata, maga tyanca agadi curada karuna takato. Yata bud'dhimanankarita motha bodha ahe
